comments.body:
Is this syntax right? With POSIX flags, I'd expect `-tTestNetwork` to mean `-t -T -e -s -t -N ...`, so I think you want `-t TestNetwork` instead... Does pflag really work with this syntax?

Furthermore, `-t` is currently not working, I broke it in the Ginkgo conversion, though it's the next thing on my plate to fix... I expect to have a PR to fix it real soon now.
